description: Mobile techniques used by FinFisher, ATT&CK software S0182 v1.2
name: FinFisher (S0182)

techniques.comment: FinFisher accesses and exfiltrates the call log.
FinFisher captures and exfiltrates SMS messages.
FinFisher exfiltrates data over commonly used ports, such as ports 21, 53, and 443.
FinFisher comes packaged with ExynosAbuse, an Android exploit that can gain root privileges.
FinFisher tracks the latitude and longitude coordinates of the infected device.
FinFisher uses the device microphone to record phone conversations.
